Title: Relates to exceptions from registration requirements for nonresident pharmacies in certain cases
Summary: Permits an exception from registration for nonresident pharmacies in cases of a specific patient need or a declared public health emergency under certain conditions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to the registration of nonresident pharmacies, manufacturers, wholesalers and outsourcing facilities that deliver prescription drugs to other establishments, authorized prescribers and patients residing in this state
